vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_cross_function.withdrawBalance (patch_2.sol#15-27):
	External calls:
	- (success) = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() (patch_2.sol#23)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockedAccounts (patch_2.sol#26)
